body_html:
The time issue seems like it could have to do with compiler options:

[ RUN      ] TimeUtil.ParseRfc3339Time
tensorflow/core/platform/cloud/time_util_test.cc:26: Failure
      Expected: 1461971724896
To be equal to: mtime_nsec / 1000 / 1000
      Which is: 1461971683186

The GCS test appears to be non-hermetic :(

2017-09-28 17:14:25.170375: I tensorflow/core/platform/cloud/retrying_utils.cc:77] The operation failed and will be automatically retried in 0 seconds (attempt 1 out of 10), caused by: Unavailable: 503

and the exponential backoff seems to be too tight.

body:
The time issue seems like it could have to do with compiler options:
```
[ RUN      ] TimeUtil.ParseRfc3339Time
tensorflow/core/platform/cloud/time_util_test.cc:26: Failure
      Expected: 1461971724896
To be equal to: mtime_nsec / 1000 / 1000
      Which is: 1461971683186
```
The GCS test appears to be non-hermetic :(

```
2017-09-28 17:14:25.170375: I tensorflow/core/platform/cloud/retrying_utils.cc:77] The operation failed and will be automatically retried in 0 seconds (attempt 1 out of 10), caused by: Unavailable: 503
```
and the exponential backoff seems to be too tight.
